name: 4Pong
description:
Well, this is my first "finished" game.

I didn't have that much time so somethings aren't "polished", (I didn't even have time to test the options menu ¯\_(ツ)_/¯ ).

The collision system has bugs sometimes, but I hope that you like the concept <3

The controls are simple, A and D to move your paddle.

Made with p5.js and love.

P.S. This is a list of stuff that I would added if I had more time:

  • Better collision system
  • Powerups
  • Sounds
  • Better AI, maybe using machine learning with tensorflow.js to create the perfect playing machine.
